data.name: Galaxy Drift
data.detailed_description:
Galaxy Drift is a high-speed retro style isometric racer inspired by classics like F-Zero, Rock n' Roll Racing and RC Pro-Am. Reach astronomical speeds and defy the laws of physics as you warp past planets, stars and black holes in an adrenaline-fueled race across the galaxy. Choose from a diverse cast of Pilots that represent the many advanced civilizations that span the known universe. Compete in the Galaxy Drift league to become Galactic Champion or race your friend in 2 player split-screen mode.

The Galaxy Drift Demo is now available, giving you a small taste of the high-speed racing action. Included in the demo is two game modes, 4 racers and 2 of the 9 tracks. Download now and check it out!



Galaxy Drift Features
  • 8+ pilots with Unique Vehicles.
  • Three separate League Cups with 3 tracks each.
  • Full gamepad support
  • Local Multiplayer (2 Player Split-Screen)
  • Online Time Trial leaderboards

    Control Options
    Galaxy Drift offers three distinct ways to control your vehicle during a race. Choose from classic, directional and mouse steering, each of which will appeal to different style of players. Experimenting is easy as you can change control methods at any time!

    Classic
    Classic controls mimic traditional isometric racing controls where the vehicle turns based on its own perspective and not the player.


    Directional
    Directional controls turn the vehicle in any direction based on the perspective of the player.


    Mouse Steering
    Mouse Steering is a special single player only control method in which you pilot the vehicle using the mouse only. The distance from the vehicle to the cursor determines speed and turning speed.




    Race across 9 tracks through 3 Cups, each with its own theme and unique mechanics. Master these tracks and dominate the competition to claim the Galaxy Drift League Championship.
